description:
Many Infusionsoft customers decide to (or are required to) implement a double opt in (email confirmation) strategy in their marketing. There is an icon in Campaign Builder to configure an email confirmation quickly, but the email is not very flexible (you can't edit it very much).

There is a way to send a customized email confirmation email that does not require using additional software plug ins. Many customers do not know about this functionality. In this course you will learn exactly how to implement this functionality in your Infusionsoft campaigns.

If you are interested in sending a more customized email confirmation email from your Infusionsoft campaigns, this course is for you.

If you are content with the email confirmation email that's included in Campaign Builder, this couse is not for you.

There are 14 lectures and over 1.5 hours of content in this course!
title: How To Create Custom Double Opt In Campaigns In Infusionsoft
